question: Which of the following statements is not correct?
choices: A row matrix has only one row
A diagonal matrix has all diagonal elements equal to zero
A symmetric matrix A is a square matrix satisfying $A^{\prime}=A$
A skew symmetric matrix has all diagonal elements equal to zero
explanation: Option 1: Definition of row matrix. Correct.
Option 2: Definition of diagonal matrix is that all NON-diagonal elements are zero. Diagonal elements can be anything. Saying diagonal elements ARE zero is false.
Option 4: Skew symmetric property requires $a_{ii} = -a_{ii} \Rightarrow 2a_{ii}=0 \Rightarrow a_{ii}=0$. Correct.
